Method.name: Register
Method.Description: Registers this extractor with the domain, preparing any required domain artifacts such as dictionary items and formats.

Method.name: Unregister
Method.Description: Removes all artifacts created in earlier calls to <method>Register</method>.

Method.name: Extract
Method.Description: Extracts item values from <var>pSourceId</var> and appends them to <var>pResults</var> pResults(ITEM, n) = $lb(value, score, classname, highlightspec, entities, negation)

Method.name: AddResult
Method.Implementation: set pResults(..#ITEMNAME, $order(pResults(..#ITEMNAME,""),-1)+1) = $lb(pValue, pScore, $classname(), pHighlightSpec, pEntities, pNegated)
